name: Abstract Magic
description:
Imagine the first sip of a cool Aperol Spritz on a Friday summer evening somewhere near the water ... the first sip is so tart, sweet and long-awaited!
Feeling like the summer heat is starting to subside and brings foam and a pleasant coolness! The sun sets and paints the sky in fantastic pink colors!
You take another sip of ice drink and realize that you have all the weekend ahead of you, all summer and all life ...
You pull your drink and understand that everything will be fine for you ...
This is exactly the feeling this picture awakens in me. I see a magical sunset over the water, I see how the evening rays are reflected in a cocktail glass and ice cubes, how calm and long-awaited coolness descends on me ...
And how do you feel?
Quote by Victoria Savich

Artwork created by Maksym Denysenko in 2017 200x100 cm   Spray paint on canvas 4616x2150 pix

The first collector of this NFT will receive this original painting. 1st collector, please DM me via Twitter @Maks_Denysenko
